<title level="1" right="Trait">[Force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 632 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Effects with this trait deal force damage or create objects made of pure magical force.
name: Force
